str2: Wherefore, on which account, therefore. From dia and hos; through which thing, i.e. Consequently.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To send for, summon. From meta and pempo; to send from elsewhere, i.e. to summon or invite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: Without contradiction, without hesitation, promptly. Adverb from anantirrhetos; promptly.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To ask, inquire, ascertain by inquiry, understand.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To send for, summon. From meta and pempo; to send from elsewhere, i.e. to summon or invite.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
